See also: Losung

German[edit]

German Wikipedia has an article on:
Lösung
Wikipedia de

Etymology[edit]

  • lösen +‎ -ung

Pronunciation[edit]

  • IPA(key): /ˈløːzʊŋ/
  • Audio
    		(file)

Noun[edit]

Lösung f (genitive Lösung, plural Lösungen)

  1. solution (answer to a riddle or problem)
  2. solution (solvent + solute; action of dissolving)
  3. cancellation
  4. breaking away

Declension[edit]

Declension of Lösung
singularplural
indef.def.noundef.noun
nominativeeinedieLösungdieLösungen
genitiveeinerderLösungderLösungen
dativeeinerderLösungdenLösungen
accusativeeinedieLösungdieLösungen
